caption.p: A proposed model shows that PirB induces apoptosis in shrimp hemocytes. When primary hemocytes of Penaeus vannamei are treated with the Pir proteins from Vibrio parahaemolyticus, the PirB protein enters the cytoplasm and nuclei. Once in the nucleus, the PirB protein interacts with histone proteins to dephosphorylate histone H3 and therefore induce apoptosis in hemocytes
